update sys_dept
DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL_NO = #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX_NO = #{faxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_NO = #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_PARENT = #{deptParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_TYPE = #{deptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_BYNAME = #{deptByname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRINT_NAME = #{printName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGFLAG = #{orgflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ADDRESS = #{deptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

iskefu = #{iskefu,jdbcType=CLOB},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_dept set DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL_NO = #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX_NO = #{faxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NO = #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_PARENT = #{deptParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_TYPE = #{deptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_BYNAME = #{deptByname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINT_NAME = #{printName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGFLAG = #{orgflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ADDRESS = #{deptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER = #{manager,jdbcType=CLOB}, LEADER1 = #{leader1,jdbcType=CLOB}, LEADER2 = #{leader2,jdbcType=CLOB}, DEPT_FUNC = #{deptFunc,jdbcType=CLOB}, isvisit = #{isvisit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iskefu=#{iskefu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_dept set DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL_NO = #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX_NO = #{faxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NO = #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_PARENT = #{deptParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_TYPE = #{deptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_BYNAME = #{deptByname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINT_NAME = #{printName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGFLAG = #{orgflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ADDRESS = #{deptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
,
from
where 1=1
and ${key} = #{val}

p

select count(1) from
p where 1=1 and DEPT_PARENT = #{_parameter}
select count(1) from SYS_PERSON p where 1=1 and DEPT_ID = #{_parameter}

select DEPT_NAME from
p where 1=1 and dept_code = #{deptcode} and dept_parent = '0'

select SEQ_ID from

and DEPT_CODE = #{organization}
and DEPT_TYPE like ''+#{deptType}+'%' or dept_type_other like ''+#{deptType}+'%'

,

p where 1=1 and d.DEPT_TYPE like #{deptType}+'%' and dept_name = #{deptName}

select
,
from
p where 1=1 and DEPT_PARENT = '0' and ORGFLAG = 1
and DEPT_CODE = #{_parameter}
order by createtime asc

select top 1 dept_no from
p where 1=1 and dept_code = #{organization} and dept_parent != '0' order by dept_no desc
SELECT * FROM sys_dept WHERE marketing = #{marketing}
SELECT SEQ_ID as id,DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM sys_dept WHERE 1=1 AND DEPT_TYPE = #{deptType} AND DEPT_CODE=#{organization} ORDER BY DEPT_NO ASC, DEPT_NAME ASC

SELECT SEQ_ID as id,DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM sys_dept WHERE 1=1 AND DEPT_PARENT in (select SEQ_ID FROM sys_dept where DEPT_PARENT='0') AND DEPT_CODE=#{organization} ORDER BY DEPT_NO ASC, DEPT_NAME ASC

from SYS_DEPT where SEQ_ID = #{seqId}

from SYS_DEPT WHERE ORGFLAG = '1'

from SYS_DEPT WHERE SEQ_ID IN(${s})
